name: smart_contract_security_audit
description: Comprehensive Solidity smart contract security audit using Foundry, Slither, and manual review. Identifies vulnerabilities (reentrancy, overflow, access control, front-running, etc.), gas optimizations, and best practice violations. Delivers a detailed audit report with severity classifications and remediation recommendations.

contractSource.description: Solidity contract source code or GitHub repository URL

scope.description: Specific contracts or functions to focus on (optional)

chainTarget.description: Target deployment chain (e.g. Base, Ethereum, Arbitrum)

deliverable: A structured JSON audit report containing: findings array (each with severity, title, description, location, recommendation), gas optimization suggestions, overall risk assessment, and summary statistics.
